subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: The win in the $1 million event at Monmouth Park was the seventh for the trainer Bob Baffert, and the fourth in five years.
snippet: The win in the $1 million event at Monmouth Park was the seventh for the trainer Bob Baffert, and the fourth in five years.
